name: Moon Colonization Project
description: Welcome to the Moon Colonization Project, a game about a space mission - to colonizate the Moon!6 heroes from USSR volunteered to live on the Moon, explore it and settle it!Explore the Moon, try to survive and save everybody of your crew!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Intel core i3 or any Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics, nVidia GeForce, AMD Radeon or any DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) E3400 2.60 GHz/2.60 GHz/ or any Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon or nVidia GeForce DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
